plot: Jeremy road tests the new Porsche 911 Carrera 2S. The boys travel to their favorite beach in Wales to test the Vauxhall Monaro, the Chrysler 300C and the Jaguar S Type-R.

The Stig puts the power of the new Porsche 911 Carrera S to the test on the test track. Jeremy has to eat more than his words over the new Vauxhall Astra. Britain takes on America and Australia when James drives a Vauxhall Monaro VRX, Jeremy drives a Chrysler 300C and Richard drives a Jaguar S-Type R. Bill Bailey is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots
